text:
When called several times consecutively, context.lookup(String) starts
returning NULL for a DataSource.
creator: maxxon@davisor.com
remm@apache.org
text:
Which factory are you using ? The Tyrex factory ?
I don't see how it can be a problem with the naming environment itself. It may 
be that the factory would need some syncing.

creator: maxxon@davisor.com
text:
Yes, Tyrex. I changed my code to store the DataSource instead of always asking
for it again, and the problem went away. Maybe Tyrex has a problem with
creating/returning the *same* datasource over and over again?

Could find very little info on the Tyrex factory, e.g. config parameters.

After experimenting with it a little bit, it looks like rebinding the resolved 
references is the easiest solution.
Nightlies for TC 4.1 already include the fix (which I've just ported to the 4.0 
branch).
creator: remm@apache.org
